name: Doge Base
description: Doge Base is a meme-inspired utility token developed on the Base blockchain. It combines the viral appeal of meme culture with real, functional use cases to provide value beyond speculation. The project offers features such as staking, NFT integration, and community-driven rewards. Its mission is to facilitate user adoption of the Base network by offering accessible, engaging tools and DeFi utilities that appeal to both crypto newcomers and experienced users. Doge Base emphasizes transparency, decentralization, and long-term community growth.
